story: Create config schema for portfolio holdings, thresholds, and alert settings
verification: config.json loads portfolio positions, mNAV thresholds, alert webhooks

story: Build price fetcher for BTC, MSTR, STRD from public APIs
verification: src/prices.js fetches current prices from CoinGecko/Yahoo Finance

story: Implement mNAV calculator (MSTR market cap / BTC holdings value)
verification: npm run analyze shows current mNAV ratio with breakdown

story: Build portfolio value calculator with position tracking
verification: Shows total portfolio value, per-asset breakdown, daily change

story: Implement drift detection (target allocation vs current allocation)
verification: npm run analyze shows drift percentage for each position
npm run rebalance outputs buy/sell amounts to restore target allocation

story: Build alert system for threshold breaches (mNAV > 2.5x, mNAV < 0.85x)
verification: Console alerts + optional webhook when thresholds crossed

story: Implement Monte Carlo simulation for portfolio projections
verification: npm run montecarlo runs 1000 sims, outputs percentile outcomes

story: Add burn rate tracking and runway calculator
verification: Shows monthly burn, months of runway at current portfolio value

story: Create daemon mode with cron-scheduled monitoring
verification: npm run daemon checks prices every hour, alerts on thresholds

story: Build historical data storage and trend analysis
verification: data/history.json tracks daily snapshots, shows 7d/30d trends

story: Add CLI dashboard with summary table output
verification: npm run monitor shows formatted table with all key metrics
